resources.string:
This activity will show and play the current song. 
A cover image of the playing Album/Artist 
It will be used ExoPlayer Library for implementing the MediaPlayer. 
The song name as well as the album art will be collected from the file's ID3 tag using MediaMetaDataRetriever class. 

It should looks like the following screenshot.

This activity will initially display all songs in the phone/SD card. 
There is also a search view in order to find a specific track. 
On the bottom of the screen will be a small window with currently playing song. 

It should looks like the following screenshot.

This activity will display a list of all artist in the library. 
It will search the name of the artist (collected from the file's ID3 tag using MediaMetaDataRetriever class) on the internet and display a picture and short information about the artist. 
On the bottom of the screen will be a small window with currently playing song. 

It should looks like the following screenshot.

This activity will display a list of all albums in the library. 
It will search the name of the album (collected from the file's ID3 tag using MediaMetaDataRetriever class) on the internet and display an album's logo. 
On the bottom of the screen will be a small window with currently playing song. 

It should looks like the following screenshot.

Playlist Activity Screen. 
It will contain all of the user's existed Playlist. 
On the bottom of the screen will be a small window with currently playing song. 

It should looks like the following screenshot.
